extension.description:
Hotel Gallery Plugin allows you to load a hotel gallery wherever you please.

To do that simply use insert the following text {hotelgallery|11} where 11 is the hotel id.
The hotel id can be retrieved from the backend when editing a hotel. While in the edit screen in the navigation bar you will see an URL ending with administrator/index.php?option=com_jhotelreservation&task=hotel.edit&cid[]=11 The part that follows after cid[]= is your hotel id. In our case 11.
